description: My responsiblity was to take care of frontend tests for the product. I worked both on fixing the current tests and optimizing them, as well as writing new tests to cover additional or new features.

Working as a web specialist, my job was development of new websites, management of existing ones, their expansion and reparation. I worked mostly with WordPress and Shoptet CMS. Ocasionally, my tasks included using HTML, CSS or JavaScript. Some of the websites I worked on were AKSystem, FurtBokem, Zlatnictví Salaba or AC Pařížská.
